supportDesc.foliation: Foliation by the library in the upper right corner.

binding.decoNote: The manuscript seems to have been rebound by the library.

history.provenance: The manuscript belonged to the monastery of Gunda Gunde, east Tigray, Ethiopia.

layout.ab: Primary pricks and horizontal pricks are visible.
The upper line is written above the ruling, the lower line is written above the ruling.

item.desc: The note states that the manuscript belongs to the church of
The names of the first owners have been everywhere erased; they were apparently and .
The names of the later owners were and .
